Malaysia: Sandakan Death Marches: Cruel marches began which were forced by Japan.
Sandakan Death Marches: The death marches came to an end.
Battle of North Borneo: A battle was fought between the Australians and Japanese.
Japan surrendered, leaving a power vacuum.
The British returned and established a military administration in the Straits Settlements.
Kedah and the three other states were returned to the British.
